dt-example.title: Using orthogonal data
dt-example.info:
This example shows how `-init SearchBuilder` can make use of orthogonal data.
The "Rating" column renders a progress bar depending on the value that it holds. SearchBuilder is unable to display progress bars in it's select elements. By setting `-init columns.searchBuilder.orthogonal` to have an `orthogonal.display` value of `'filter'`, the raw numerical data is displayed instead.
